title: Greed or Give [ OCE RP Giveaway ]

embed.description: Greed Or Give! Welcome to the Christmas edition of Greed or Give, we've got RP to win for that special someone, or keep for yourself. Let's play! To...

body:
Just thought I'd let you guys know, OceanicGiveaways are doing a giveaway for RP atm. All details are in the link. Yeah, GL.

{{item:3301}}  Get dat monies.

replies.body: Though this thread would be about who gets the kill and which is more better to do. lol
It's almost 2015, who the hell still uses Facebook?
